Thank You FXG team for all your superb uploads!  As a 100% disabled combat wounded veteran with PTSD, Panic Disorder, Agoraphobia, Nerve damage, and Degenerative disc disease, living on disability, you have helped make my quality of live a bit better.  As I cannot go out to the store or the movie theaters or anywhere else for that matter, you have helped keep my mind off things with great quality movies.   I don't even have to read the comments for your rips!  If you are the upload er, I already know that the quality is good and the movie is real with no viruses embed-ed!

So thank you for all your rips!

this one is 10/10/9 A/V/M

thanks a TON!

as a side note, I have a large collection of M9-M10 DVD and Blue Ray movies and would like to contribute also, but I don't know how to rip/upload.  If someone can show me how, I will put up 100s of DVD/BR rips of the finest quality.  I just got a new computer with dual 750G hard drives and a DVD ROM/burner with 6 gigs of ram and a dual processor, so I have plenty of memory to put up movies, I just don;t have the know how.

Normally I just download, but you and a few others have inspired me to contribute!  plzs show me the way!

~juice US Army Spec Ops RET
